feed.title: Weekly Five
feed.subtitle: Five articles weekly, raising awareness of important technologies, following news in the industry and to trying to make our life, work and code a little bit better every week.

entry.title: Weekly Five 131
entry.summary: Welcome to Weekly Five! This week’s links: Things your manager might not know Is “managing-up” always bad? Being good at telling your manager the right information at the right time and asking for what you need is a superpower. It makes you way more valuable to have on a team (because your manager knows they can trust you to give them the information they need), and it’s more likely th...
